page.title: 04SCHOOLS; CARE OF THE ELDERLY
page.content:
There are many schools in the area for the{education}of younger children. These are First Schools, for five to nine year olds. Children in Keighley then transfer to Middle Schools. They stay at their Middle School until they are 13 years old, and then go on to an Upper School. They can stay at an Upper School until they are 18 years old. There is a centre for the handicapped of all ages.
{ Housing}is provided for the elderly population in two purpose built homes, and some bungalows with a warden service. Here the occupants can be independent, and yet have help at hand in an emergency.
